com.fluidops.iwb.wiki
Class WikiSynchronizer

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.WikiSynchronizer

public class WikiSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object

Static methods for synchronizing semantic links in Wiki when statements have been changed/deleted outside the Wiki.

Author:
tma, msc, dau

Method Detail

changeSemanticLinks

public static void changeSemanticLinks(org.openrdf.model.Statement oldStmt,
                                       org.openrdf.model.Statement newStmt)
Wrapper-method for IWB-usage. Wraps recalculation of wikitexts and storage to the IWB-Wikistorage

Parameters:
oldStmt - The old Statement to be replaced
newStmt - The new Statement to replace the old Statement

changeSemanticLinks

public static void changeSemanticLinks(java.util.List<com.fluidops.util.Pair<org.openrdf.model.Statement,org.openrdf.model.Statement>> pairList)
Wrapper-method for IWB-usage. Wraps recalculation of wikitexts and storage to the IWB-Wikistorage

Parameters:
pairList - A List of Pairs consisting of the old a new Statements

removeSemanticLinks

public static void removeSemanticLinks(org.openrdf.model.Statement stmt)
Wrapper for IWB-usage. Wraps removing of semantic annotations from the Wikistorage, if the resulting statements have been removed.

Parameters:
stmt - A Statement containing a URI/Literal

removeSemanticLinks

public static void removeSemanticLinks(java.util.List<org.openrdf.model.Statement> stmtList)
Wrapper for IWB-usage. Wraps removing of semantic annotations from the Wikistorage, if the resulting statements have been removed.

Parameters:
stmtList - A List of Statements containing URIs/Literals
